# File lib/ext_ind.rb, line 62
    def directive_size(directive)
      case directive
      when /^[eFfgIiLlNPpV]$/ then 4
      when /^[DdEGQq]$/ then 8
      when /^[AaBbCcHhUwxZ]$/ then 1
      when /^[nSsv]$/ then 2
      when 'M' then 3
      when 'm' then 5
      when 'u' then 6
      else
        nil
      end
    end
